name: Dream Channel
description: Dream Channel is a 'choose your own adventure' VR series about gangsters who buy and sell dreams on the black market. Players enter a VR world (The Dream Channel) and soon discover that their dreams have been stolen too!
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 and above Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 or AMD FX 8350, equivalent or better Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 970 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 25 GB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 and above Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 or AMD FX 8350, equivalent or better Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 980 DirectX: Version 12 Storage: 30 GB available space
